ygData.subject: Good Night, Rex
ygData.msgSnippet: The nerve gas will basically either make Rex go insane or whatever you chose, Yanshosh, either way it is designed to put him into stasis lock at the end. ...

The nerve gas will basically either make Rex go insane or whatever you 
chose, Yanshosh, either way it is designed to put him into stasis lock at 
the end.

: BrightBlade simply watched, as Rex was defeated, the gas taking effect and 
sending him to the floor.
Before the gas had a chance to reach her she slipped a cloth cover over her 
voice silencer, a simple mask to keep her from suffering the same fate as 
the Maximal.
She shakes her head as she looks at the defeated Rex, though, suddenly 
jumping as sirens go off.
Slag!
They must have detected the gas! No matter, she had enough to swamp this 
whole pathetic ship!
BrightBlade growls to herself as she backs up towards the door, wondering if 
she had anything that could get through the seal.
But just then she suddenly sees the door dent inward, jumping back in 
surprise at the sudden sound.
Was it Maximals?
She raised her gun towards the door, ready to shoot incase it was.
This day was getting more interesting my the second. *
.
